definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Results show that PCE is degraded by reductive dechlorination.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，PCE是通过还原脱氯发生生物降解的。

sentences.english: Under sulfate reduction condition, aniline degradation was incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 反硫化条件下，苯胺降解不完全。

sentences.english: Changes in proteins of Semimembranosus and Biceps muscles mainly happened during curing and fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 股二头肌的蛋白质降解主要是在腌制期和发酵中后期。

sentences.english: These are especially important for environmental applications where biodegradability is a major requirement.
sentences.chinese: 生物可降解性是环境保护的重要要求。

sentences.english: Biomass may also include biodegradable wastes that can be burnt as fuel.
sentences.chinese: 生物量还包括能够当作燃料燃烧的可降解废料。

sentences.english: Aim To determine aftereffect in the degradation of cotton cellulose.
sentences.chinese: 研究棉纤维素的辐射降解的后效应。

sentences.english: Degradation rate (DR) of chitosan in the hydrogels decreased with increase of SD.
sentences.chinese: 水凝胶中壳聚糖的降解速率随取代度的升高而降低。

sentences.english: Microalgae has the ability to degrade and accumulate organic pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 微藻具有富集和降解有机污染物的能力。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of drug on chemical degradation of lipopolysaccharide (LPS) from oral anaerobes.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估各种药物对口腔厌氧菌内毒素的降解作用。

sentences.english: It′s shown that the efficiency of catalyzed degradation is directly proportional to the time of bubbling oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 实验表明催化氧化降解效率与鼓氧时间成正比。

sentences.english: The degradation of Fuchsin acid in aqueous solution by contact glow discharge electrolysis is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了接触辉光放电等离子体降解水体中的酸性品红。

sentences.english: The influence of operation conditions on the degradation of 4-nitrophenol in water by ozone was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了各种操作条件对臭氧降解水中对硝基酚的影响。

sentences.english: The applications of ligninase in the bleaching were mainly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重介绍了三种木素降解酶在漂白中的应用。

sentences.english: Relationship between photocatalytic degradation of benzoic acids and reaction with hydroxyl radical.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲酸类光催化降解和羟基自由基反应的关系。

sentences.english: With increase of the particle size the photodegradation efficiency decrease obviously.
sentences.chinese: 而随着颗粒粒径的增加，光降解效率明显降低。

sentences.english: Bedsides, the degradation component has no side effect on the environment.
sentences.chinese: 易降解，且降解产物对环境无影响。

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
